name: Quicksilver
text: Super Speed - Response: After you use one of Quicksilver's basic powers (THW, ATK, or DEF), ready him. (Limit once per phase.)

name: Pietro Maximoff
text: Superpowered Siblings - Action: Discard 2 cards from your hand → draw 2 cards (draw 3 cards instead if Wanda Maximoff is in play). (Limit once per round.)

name: Scarlet Witch
text: Interrupt: When you use one of Scarlet Witch's basic powers, discard the top card of the encounter deck. For each boost icon discarded this way, Scarlet Witch gets +1 to that power for this use.

flavor: "I'm the fastest man on Earth." - Quicksilver
name: Always Be Running
text: Hero Action: Ready Quicksilver.

name: Double Time
text: Hero Action: Choose two of the following (you may choose the same option twice): - Deal 2 damage to an enemy. - Remove 2 threat from a scheme.

flavor: "Ever been punched at supersonic speed?" - Quicksilver
name: Maximum Velocity
text: Max 1 per phase. Hero Action: You get +2 THW, +2 ATK, and +2 DEF until the end of the round.

name: Speed Cyclone
text: Hero Action: Stun X Enemies.

flavor: Corporate sponsors of the superhero team known as X-Factor.
name: Serval Industries
text: Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Serval Industries → shuffle 2 Quicksilver cards from your discard pile into your deck.

name: Accelerated Reflex
text: Quicksilver gets +1 DEF.

name: Friction Resistance
text: Hero Response: After you ready Quicksilver, ready this card. Resource: Exhaust Friction Resistance → generate a [physical] resource.

flavor: "Surely you can do better than that." - Quicksilver
name: Hyper Perception
text: Quicksilver gets +1 THW.

flavor: "The future is written by the winners." - Quicksilver
name: Reinforced Sinew
text: Quicksilver gets +1 ATK.

name: Multiple Man
text: Response: After Multiple Man enters play, search your deck and hand for a copy of Multiple Man and put it into play. Shuffle your deck if it was searched this way.

flavor: "Self thinks this is a mistake. But then, self is very young and knows very little."
name: Warlock
text: Action: Spend a [mental] resource → heal up to 2 damage from Warlock.

name: Never Back Down
text: Hero Interrupt (defense): When you defend against an attack, you get +2 DEF for this attack. If you take no damage from this attack, stun the attacking enemy.

name: Side Step
text: Hero Interrupt (defense): When you would take any amount of damage, prevent 3 of that damage. If you paid for this card using [energy] resource, deal 1 damage to that enemy.

name: Nerves of Steel
text: Play under any player's control. Max 1 per player. Resource: Exhaust Nerves of Steel → generate a [energy] resource for a [[Defense]] event.

name: Order and Chaos
text: Team-Up (Quicksilver and Scarlet Witch). Max 1 per deck. Hero Interrupt: When a treachery card is revealed from the encounter deck, cancel its "When Revealed" effects, then deal 2 damage to the villain.

flavor: "Wow, lady! And I thought Gamora was intense." - Rocket Raccoon
name: Adrenaline Rush
text: Hero Action: Discard Adrenaline Rush → your hero gets +1 ATK until the end of the phase.

flavor: "Please stay calm! Everything will be okay!" - Ms. Marvel
name: Civic Duty
text: Hero Action: Discard Civic Duty → your hero gets +1 THW until the end of the phase.

name: Brute Force
text: Your hero gets +1 ATK. Your basic attacks gain piercing. (Discard any tough status cards from the target before dealing damage.) Forced Response: After you make a basic attack, discard Brute Force.

name: Sense of Justice
text: Play under any player's control. Max 1 per player. Resource: Exhaust Sense of Justice → generate a [mental] resource for a [[Thwart]] event.

name: United We Stand
text: Play only if your identity has the [[Avenger]] trait. Hero Action: Heal 1 damage from up to X friendly characters (to a maximum of 3 characters), where X is equal to the villain's stage number.

name: Beat 'Em Up
text: Hero Action: Deal 1 damage to the villain and each minion engaged with you.
